website_summaries.verdict: This is what a high end bread knife should look like, and we definitely recommend it to professional cooks and dedicated home bread makers. May be a little too expensive for casual users.
cons: Downward handle is awkward and hard to control

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - save your money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this product gets such great reviews. Seems more efforts are put into fancy packaging than into the function of the knife. I find it very difficult to cut crusty artisan breads. The knife bounces around on the crust and is therefore dangerous. I've used very inexpensive bread knives that did a better job, and plan to return to them. Customer service was very responsive to an initial contact, and automatically sent an unrequited replacement. Now I have two knives I don't want to use, and would want to give to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: TBARD

customer_reviews.title: Why don't you already own this knife?
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOD if you are still reading reviews for Dalstrong knives then you obviously just haven't used one yet. Immediately buy every knife they've ever made you won't regret it. Hurry up, go buy them. This one is super sharp and cuts really smoothly. I use it for bread (obviously) but also for Tofu. If you cut through the Tofu with a slight sawing motion until you're halfway through, then saw in the other direction, it leaves PERFECT marks that look like muscle layers in fish. I mean, it isn't really that important for the tofu to have these but it does make for some pretty presentation when it is cooked up. I love these knives.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cut easily
customer_reviews.text: I read about a lot of bread knives before deciding on this one. Read the ratings and reviews and was convinced I had selected a great knife. Not cheap, but not so expensive I had to sell a kidney. I make crusty artisan bread mostly and this does a decent job. Still tears of loaf a bit to cut through, especially bottom crust. I really wanted to live this knife. I just don’t. I’m disappointed I wasted my money. Also, the wood on handle doesn’t feel nice and smooth. The metal and wood don’t align like intended and feels a bit rough in hand while cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Golden, Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: I own one of the most expensive knife sets out there. This is comparable to the best for a fraction of the cost. The heft and hone of the blade are superb and the handle appears to be well designed. It is perfect for the bread slicer I bought to cut my homemade bread. Glides through the loaves with ease for perfect slices. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: E. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Knife from Dalstrong
customer_reviews.text: I am more than satisfied with this bread knife. It has a good heft and cuts cleanly. It even cuts warm, just baked bread without mashing it. The knife comes snuggled in a classy well-made box and includes a sheath to protect the 10" blade - and fingers. Included in the box are little extras: a cleaning cloth, an instruction booklet, and a key chain with the Dalstrong logo. It is obvious that considerable thought and care has been given to the product and its presentation. This knife and all that comes with it bespeaks quality. Anyone looking for a good bread knife would be delighted with this Dalstrong Gladiator Series bread knife.
customer_reviews.author: Martha H.

customer_reviews.title: Went back to my old bread knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to slice my homemade bread. I use a bread slicing guide and my old Cutco knife (over 50 yrs old) was a little short. After giving this knife a couple of weeks of use, I found it didn't cut slices cleanly. I went back to my old bread knife. The knife is well made and perfect length for my purposes. However, it sits in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: mascasa

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, but Not Very Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and full tang, but this knife fell short of my expectations. The knife felt rather dull, I could run it across the back of my hand with slight pressure with no effect. The handle feels too small for this size knife and the butt of the knife actually has a sharp edge that is uncomfortable to hold. I sent it back. Better knives out there.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this knife. Pros: Well made, Durable High quality steel that holds a good edge Handsome design Cons: Serrations are too deep and result in rough cuts and tearing on hard-crusted loave Heavy
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This is a serious knife
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews about the packaging and heft of this knife and they were all correct! This is a substantial knife with just enough weight to do the work for you. First use was a loaf of crusty italian bread and the knife sliced through beautifully. Priced other knives at the mall before deciding to buy this one. Seems like a much better knife for a fraction of the price. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Anne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Quality Knife
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Wusthof knives for over thirty year. I thought I would try this brand as the price was right. The knife is a work of art and cuts through bread as if it is warm butter. I loved the the knife so much I bought three other knives. The quality of the knives are spectacular. I highly recommend the purchase of any of their knives.
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Customer Service, Buy with Absolute Confidence
customer_reviews.text: While my initial review of this knife only provided 1 star, I have now modified that review based on a level of customer service that I have not experienced elsewhere. I found the Dalstrong 10" bread knife to be difficult to cut a straight slice of bread. I advised Dalstrong of this feedback and with absolutely no hesitation, they stood behind the product and replaced it. I am extremely satisified with the replacement, which is also the basis for the revised review.
customer_reviews.author: David from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Their products never disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: The knife first off looks gorgeous and the steel is high quality. The serrated blade cuts through bread wonderfully and makes slicing evenly no issue. Forget having to hack off a piece of bread with this thing. Wish it was a bit smaller of a blade so it was easier to wield but still not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Cuts beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a daughter-in-law who loves the whole bread-making process. She likes the length (10") and says it is heavy enough and cuts beautifully. It also fits in her standard knife block. Apparently, I made her very happy! From my perspective, I support small businesses as often as possible, and Dalstrong is a family-owned small business.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great knife! Impressive gift!
customer_reviews.text: First, this knife comes in a beautiful box, a presentation box basically. It would make a great gift. This knife feels really great in your hand. I don't have another knife that feels as well balanced. So far I have only cut bread with it, and it did it beautifully. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: hunny

customer_reviews.title: This knife is difficult to use and does not cut straight.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this 10" bread knife. It is difficult to use. The blade thick and heavy, and it is slightly warped, making it pull to the left. It is impossible to cut anything straight down. Both my husband and I had the same issue. I emailed the manufacturer for support, but have not gotten a reply.
customer_reviews.author: allison coffin

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, super nice knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is frighteningly sharp. Right out of the box, you can expect it to slice whatever you need. I bought one for myself and my co-worker. We use them for bread, of course, but also tomatoes, chicken roulades, prosciutto wrapped pork tenderloin and so on. Very versatile, VERY sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly beautiful knife.
customer_reviews.text: The bread knife comes with a strong and necessary shield. It is very sharp and cuts fresh bread very well. I also bought one for my daughter and am sure she will like it as much as I like mine.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Great knives I bought one to try it and was so surprised at how sharp they really are. They are very well balanced and seem to stay sharp longer than some of the others. I do not put them in dishwasher they are hand washed and wiped down. Is a little long for what I really need but does work really well.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a musician, so sound accuracy is important. Boze does not disappoint. Love the quality of sound, Love that it's portable. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Harp Lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knife at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Knife. Nice weight, well balanced. Seems to be great quality. Comes in a beautiful box--good for gifting. Great bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: inga

customer_reviews.title: Great bread knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the first “serious” bread knife I’ve owned and I love it. Wish I had gotten it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Gnewt

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I know I could find a cheaper knife out there; in fact plenty of them. But I wanted something strong and durable that would last the rest of my life. This knife delivers in all ways. You can tell the quality. It is well balanced and cuts like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: KBelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - Best Value Available
customer_reviews.text: DALSTRONG Bread Knife is absolutely beautiful. As a special gift for those who love to cook or in one’s own kitchen. The knife’s handle is perfectly crafted, very special, and the knife is wonderfully balanced. It is by far the best knife I have ever had and possibly the best value available.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good and works good.
customer_reviews.text: It's not just for bread. Sharp blade worked well slicing soft tomatoes. Haven't tried it on any hard skinned vegetables yet. Solid comfortable feel. Made for the chef in all of us.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Slice and eat
customer_reviews.text: The extra long blade is great for bigger items and I also use it on things like Prime rib or beef wellington.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Eizenhafer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knife and company.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent knife. We needed one that is a little longer and sharp to cut our homemade bread. This knife works wonderfully. It was sent quickly. The company really wants to make sure the customer is happy. I would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Liz Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bread knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is perfect. The weight of it is great. It is a nice length for cutting through a wide loaf of bread. I have already used it and it worked better then I could have hoped. I cook all the time and this is the perfect addition to my knives. It was also beautifully boxed and would make a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reheis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice... Maybe even 5
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel. I'll order a set of these. They even look nice just sitting there in my knife holder. This knife is very long. Pay attention to the inches when you're selecting your knife.
customer_reviews.author: reading

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't quite cut it!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it doesn't cut well through crusty bread. I purchased this specifically for those hard to cut through crusty loaves and it's not doing the job. It's okay if you have a softer loaf of bread, but I make sourdough artisan loaves. Back to the drawing board and it looks like I'll have to spend more to get a higher quality, sharper bread knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: I became a lifelong Dahlstrong loyalist with the first slice
customer_reviews.text: This knife is so well made. It is a blessing to have a breadknife where I can let the knife do the cutting, while I do the guiding.
customer_reviews.author: Hoquiam Reader/Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Bread Knife
customer_reviews.text: I make my own healthy bread with stone ground whole wheat, flax seeds, and other seeds. It was getting very difficult for me to slice the bread due to serious arthritis in my hand. This knife makes it so easy to slice my bread, I am so happy to have found it. It is expensive but it will last forever, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn M. Slade

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bread knife!
customer_reviews.text: High quality knife without having to overspend. Sharp as you could possibly want it. I use it for bread and soft vegetables and it works like a champ! You treat it properly and it will treat you properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Green

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Knives are very superior and proud to be an owner.
customer_reviews.author: LLURB

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Dalstrong Knife.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this company shows that there number one concern is you, the customer. The detail and quality of this bread knife is top of the line! Even the detail in the packaging was great! I've been in food service over 28 years and I no how important it is to have a great knife to work with. So I would highly recommend this bread knife to anyone that appreciates high quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: A fine knife.
customer_reviews.text: I've been baking bread at home for some time now, and this knife makes slicing a loaf simple. Without downward pressure and with a steady slicing action, the knife makes a clean, straight cut. Its construction, balance, weight, and comfort in the hand all indicate high quality.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: DALSTRONG Bread Knife - Gladiator Series - German HC Steel - 10"
customer_reviews.text: Simply superior craftsmanship. Period. By far, the best quality knife I have ever bought, and far less expensive than the more well known German high carbon steel professional quality knives. I loved this knife so much that I immediately looked for other knives manufactured by the same company. Even the packaging is superior.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cuda

customer_reviews.title: Best Bread Knife Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Cutting crusty sourdough breads (my new hobby) and this knife is da bomb!!! My bread knife was not working and I loved the boning knife, so I bought the bread knife. Wonderful knives!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B. Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Just the right tool to cut through those homemade crusty loaves of bread!
customer_reviews.text: Heavyweight - kind of over the top packaging but works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, substantially made
customer_reviews.text: This knife is solid and does the job intendend. I've never had another bread knife to compare it to but I do love the way this one feels. Heavy duty and builit solidly.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, better value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife, especially for the price. Incredibly nice, comfortable handle. Impressive for knife at this price point. The blade is serrated on one side only, the knife is meant to be held in the right hand. This keeps the blade from wandering out of the slice. Like I said, great knife.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality
customer_reviews.text: This knife is everything it claims to be. The box it comes in could be used as a presentation piece. It is razor sharp out of the box. We make homemade crusty bread,and it slides right through with hardly any crumbs. I even cut it in 1/2" thick slices. I highly recommend this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: After cutting myself with an old cheap bread knife, I decided it was time to upgrade to something better. This knife is excellent. It's sharp and has a nice weight to the handle. It feels well made. I've used it on a few different bread loaves now, and it cuts through effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The knife came in a professional storage box with magnet closure inside of a sleeve, metal brooch pin with their logo, to proudly show off and a few other items.
customer_reviews.author: George A Rieder Jr

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This knife is everything it says it is and more. Needless to say based on the reviews I read, I was not surprised I received this knife. It is everything I expected in a quality bread knife. I'll be purchasing other Dalstrong products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Hamhock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bread knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bread knife I have used. It is sharp, has good balance and cut straight. At first I thought I only need to buy an 8 inches bread knife, but after using this 10 inches bread knife to cut up a loaf of Country French Bread with a hard crust, I knew an 8 inches knife would not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: CUTTING BREAD. THIS IS THE FIRST SHARP BREAD KNIFE THAT I EVER USED. WOW, EVERY SLICE IS PERFECT, NO MESS NO CRUMBS, NO FLATTENED BREAD. WHY DID I WAIT THIS LONG TO BUY ONE.
customer_reviews.author: James Regotti

customer_reviews.title: I really like this knife
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knife. It is easy to use. It cuts though my homemade bread without making many crumbs. I don't like that it is made in the people's republic of China.☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally . . . The Perfect Bread Knife!
customer_reviews.text: The Dalstrong bread knife is amazing. Slicing into our newly baked bread is effortless and caring for the blade is as easy as a quick rinse and dry! My husband and I have even been trying new bread recipes due in part to this wonderful cutting tool.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: If you love homemade bread, you'll love this bread knife!
customer_reviews.text: As I bake various types of breads on a weekly basis, I decided to treat myself to a first-class bread knife -- and the Dalstrong is it! What a lovely knife -- well-balanced, incredibly sharp, cuts through bread "like butter"! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M. Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Great knife very sharp and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great knife very sharp and sturdy. Well balanced great handle makes cuts better than Sweeney Todd on a Friday night. You can tell it was made by craftsmen not a robot. Highly recommend and will buy more sizes from Dalstrong in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Mahoners

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a beautiful knife, amazing craftsmanship, razor sharp, a work of art and function. I have been a professional chef for 40 years and own all the expensive German knifes, this brand is on par with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sharp knife. I've only used it a couple of times since I've had it but it is so much better than the old, cheap one I had for so long. Good knives are such a treat to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife! I'm very happy with this. Excellent quality. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: armstrongmom

customer_reviews.title: Best Knives
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Dalstrong knife. The quality is unbelievable. Good weight, hand feel and balance also. I was so impressed with the first one that I bought this one without hesitation. If you purchase this knife, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DCN

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Crafted Knife
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. It is beautifully crafted and is very sharp. Cuts through crusty bread like "a hot knife through butter". Excellent product and at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Best bread knife I've ever used - super sharp
customer_reviews.text: Best bread knife I've ever used - super sharp, doesn't smash the bread down when slicing. Handle feels great in my large and as well as my wife's small hand. Very well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Field

customer_reviews.title: Great bread knife
customer_reviews.text: Fast service great products. Love that bread knife slices through without crushing my fresh baked bread even when it's still warm.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy McLoed

customer_reviews.title: Sharp purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really great knife, especially for the price. It works very well on my sourdough loaves. I love the size and weight of this knife for large loaves of bread. The sheath is really nice for transporting and storing, and the wooden handle is beautiful. It's a handsome knife to say the least. I will definitely re-visit this brand when I'm looking to buy knives in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp, great quality, half the price of most comparable serrateds
customer_reviews.author: stephen jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Better than some electric knives I have used.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, easy to handle and seems very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McQ

customer_reviews.title: Bread knife
customer_reviews.text: Best bread knife I have ever owned. Well balanced, cuts smoothly and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knife. Beautifully balanced
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful knife. Beautifully balanced. Just feels good in your hand!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to cut anything with this knife.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking and feeling knife. I own some of Really good knives from Shun on down and this is the dullest serrated knife I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced
customer_reviews.text: This bread knife looks and feels mighty. It is well balanced and a pleasure to use. Cuts beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Rosio

customer_reviews.title: beautiful handle and grip
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive bread knife. High quality steel, beautiful handle and grip, very sharp. Knife arrives in a nice box and has a good sheath to protect the blade. Looking forward to using this knife for many years to come and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Nyberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the quality and craftsmanship! Heavy, Sharp, Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shah

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I always struggled cutting bread. No more. It is a breeze. And not only bread, but also tomatoes, and other veggies and fruits. Love it. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marzena

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, amazing knife
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, amazing knife!!! It is as sharp as can be!! When slicing home made bread it leaves very little crumbs, as apposed to other bread knives I have used. It allows me to cut the bread in very even slices, so very easily. I don't know how I have lived without it all these years! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice economically priced knife.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the knife a lot and it was shipped FAST. I only wish they had more information on the steel used. It just says high carbon German steel.
customer_reviews.author: Lettusaurus

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking knife, very well made, although I ordered the wrong style, I’ve decided to keep it!,
customer_reviews.author: Charles Shields

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, heavy & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Knife is beautiful, heavy, and very sharp. Came in a classy box with a cute little DALSTRONG keychain and microfiber cloth. We're very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: J Littleton

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife! I bake really crusty sourdough bread, and this knife cuts through it much easier than any other knives I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Knife
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly and in excellent condition. It cuts well and is easy to use. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Bell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful knife. Makes me feel like a better cook, just using it. Easy to wield. Cuts like a dream
customer_reviews.author: M. Sommar

customer_reviews.title: A great craftsmanship of a knife that is easy on the ...
customer_reviews.text: A great craftsmanship of a knife that is easy on the wallet. I have been using this in a production kitchen and it has never failed me. This is my go to for serrated knife.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Knife!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, feel, & sharpness. Slices like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sharp knofe.  Cust both crusty and soft breads without squashing them
customer_reviews.text: Sharp knofe. Cust both crusty and soft breads without squashing them
customer_reviews.author: Mark BrandMunicipal S. Corp

customer_reviews.title: Hard crust, no problem
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful knife. Cuts my sourdough easily and leaves few crumbs. Worth every bit of what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: F. K. Groening

customer_reviews.title: Well made solid sharp
customer_reviews.text: Love the look.how sharp it is and the packaging They even give you a lapel pin as if I will wear it. Does everything it said cuts bread without a lot of damage to it and does a great job on tomatoes. Love a good knife and this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Stark

customer_reviews.title: Best knives I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best knives I have ever used! My next set will be the Shugun series! Love their products and service!
customer_reviews.author: Tammyoeo

customer_reviews.title: A solid knife
customer_reviews.text: This bread knife cuts well, but the blade is thicker than I would prefer. The handle is ergonomic and fits a hand well.
customer_reviews.author: Grandelise

customer_reviews.title: Sliced through fresh, hot, bread like butter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife! I can get perfect, beautiful slices even when the bread is piping hot from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: The bread knife is nicely crafted and handles well
customer_reviews.text: The bread knife is nicely crafted and handles well. I like having a sheath on the knife and would like all knives to have covers. The packaging was certainly well designed. One nicety that could be add is a the correct size sharping tool.
customer_reviews.author: EJ-Who

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...i hope it stays sharp as it is now...great knife
customer_reviews.author: Marie Bland

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect in Garde Manger
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous knife, I'm a culinary student. Works perfect in Garde Manger.
customer_reviews.author: Taytania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best knife ever. After receiving mine and was soooo pleased I decided to purchas one for a gift. GREAT product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... layers to create a four-layer cake and it worked beautifully. Can't wait to try it on my homemade ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far but I used it to cut through cake layers to create a four-layer cake and it worked beautifully. Can't wait to try it on my homemade bread.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This knife is very strong and impressive looking. It cuts amazingly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Roman

customer_reviews.title: Where has this knife been....
customer_reviews.text: Great bread knife - cuts my large loafs, crusty loafs, bagels...
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line product
customer_reviews.text: Well made product at unbelievable price. This bread knife/slicer is a well made and finished as well or better than the top of the line Wusthof, Henckels and the like at an low price point, excellent deep scalloped blade will cut anything cleanly and neatly from soft bread to a steam ship round of beef. This is a serious knife.
customer_reviews.author: jcb113

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sharp knives I've seen for a while.
customer_reviews.author: WatchDog

customer_reviews.title: Great bread knife
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this knife. I started making artisan bread at home and had hard time slicing the loaves. This bread knife does the job very efficiently and effortlessly. It is very easy to handle and it makes perfect slices. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Bread Lady

customer_reviews.title: It slices through everything so easily!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new knife! It slices through everything so easily!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hawryluk

customer_reviews.title: I really love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I really love this knife. It is heavy enough to glide through the bread without squashing it. The knife really does all the work. It is very well made with quality materials and is very sharp. Don't know what I did without it. Now my homemade bread is sliced perfectly. Marcelle
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle Sholly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Love the weight and shape of handle. The long 10 inch blade is perfect for cutting large home made breads. The cover for blade is a nice addition. I would buy more of their knives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome knife! I bake Artisan Sourdough and my old ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome knife! I bake Artisan Sourdough and my old Faberware bread knife just wasn't cutting it. LOL This knife is super easy to use, well made and cuts smoothly. I can cut thin slices which is perfect for sandwiches. Well worth the money. Quality too!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time in perfect shape. The knife works beautifully on bread, cake and watermelon.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Has a great feel in the hand.
customer_reviews.text: Has a great feel in the hand. The blade is perfect. Beautiful knife.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bread knife I have ever used. It slices through the bread with the greatest of ease and does not tear the bread. I highly recommend this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: hi quality @ a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: surprised at the quality and solid feel this knife had at a very reasonable price, will definitely buy another type soon.
customer_reviews.author: sdieddie

product_meta.title: DALSTRONG Bread Knife - Gladiator Series - German HC Steel - 10" (254 mm) - w/Sheath
feature_bullets: Outstanding craftsmanship, cutting-edge technology, stunning design elements, and premium materials. Peak performance has never looked so good at this price.

Incredibly razor sharp, full-tang, imported high-carbon German steel with a hand polished edge at 14-16 degrees. Geometrically angled serrations ensure effortlessly thin slicing with a single stroke, minimal crumb dispersion with breads, and painlessly smooth cutting of large fruits, cabbage, and boneless hams

Award winning bread knife design, with satisfying heft, premium materials and quality feel. Luxury imported black pakkawood handle is triple-riveted with a grip that ensures comfort and maneuverability. Laminated and polished for a sanitary build, perfect for busy kitchens

Engineered to perfection at 56+ Rockwell hardness and hand polished to a satin finish. Carefully tapered for improved hardness, flexibility, and minimal slicing resistance. Tall blade height provides useful knuckle clearance.

See why thousands of professional chefs, bakers, bread makers, fruit stand owners and home cooks love and trust the DALSTRONG DIFFERENCE. 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free, we know you'll love it!
